label: Varga, Oleksandr & Aleksey Reshchikov.  2015. First record of the genus Acropimpla Townes, 1960 (Hymenoptera:  Ichneumonidae: Pimplinae) from Thailand, with descriptions of  three new species. Zootaxa 4013(4): 556–570.
